mapper.select: select * from areas order by area_no

select mem_no, nvl(count(area_no), 0) count from (select M.mem_no, A.* from mem M left outer join interest_areas I on M.mem_no = I.mem_no left outer join areas A on I.area_no = A.area_no where M.mem_no = #{memNo}) group by mem_no
mapper.delete: delete interest_areas where mem_no = #{memNo} and area_no = #{areaNo}
